name: agentic-monad-economy-backend
description: Section 1 smart contract backend for AGENTIC MONAD ECONOMY

scripts.deploy:local:v2: set AME_CONTRACT_VERSION=v2&& hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:monad:v2: set AME_CONTRACT_VERSION=v2&& hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network monadTestnet
